column1: Table 4--U.S. strawberry harvested acreage, yield per acre, and production, 13 States, 1970-2012 1/
-- = not reported.   1/ Ten other States were reported prior to 1976: Illinois, Indiana, Kentucky, Maryland, Massachusetts, Missouri, Oklahoma, Tennessee, and Texas.  2/ Preliminary.
Source:  USDA, National Agricultural Statistics Service, Noncitrus Fruits and Nuts Summary, various issues.
